title: Gavi Support Guidelines
description: Eligible countries can access detailed guidelines to manage the support they receive from Gavi.
cleaned_text: Eligible countries can access detailed guidelines to manage the support they receive from Gavi. [Gavi 5.0 Ceilings by country and support type](/news/document-library/gavi-50-ceilings-country-and-support-type) The document consolidates ceilings for financial support Gavi-eligible countries can apply for as a part of their new application submissions within the Gavi 5.0 period. [Cold chain equipment technology guide](/news/document-library/cold-chain-equipment-technology-guide) This document is designed to guide country applications for cold chain equipment (CCE) support, providing a structured approach to CCE purchasing decisions. It helps identify which devices comply with the requirements of Gavi's cold chain equipment platform, allowing countries to choose solutions that best meet the needs of their health facilities.
